revised_title: On the Solution of Linear Differential Equations: A Theoretical and Practical Approach
tldr: The author presents a method for solving linear differential equations using symbolic computation, demonstrating its application to various forms of equations and highlighting its practical utility. The method involves converting symbols in the equations, leading to new forms of solutions that may be interpretable or not. The author also discusses connections between the solutions obtained and those of the same equations in the form of definite integrals.
